searchDocs.title: Getting started with PenguinEngine
searchDocs.content: Getting started with PenguinEngine Here are some quick links to get started with PenguinEngine: Installation guideAPI docs PenguinEngine is a module script loader largely inspired by Quenty's Nevermore Engine, and is designed to be compatible with it. This monorepo of packages is merely an extension of Nevermore, and is not a replacement. Although, it can still be installed and used standalone from Nevermore.
